GSP28sabbha1u:4: evaṃ hi vedavākyāny eva ebhir vyākhyāyante /
GSP28sabbha1u:5: itarathā vedavākyāni vyākhyeyāni svapadārthāś ca vyākhyeyāḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:7: tatra loke 'yam athaśabdo vṛttād anantarasya prakriyārtho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:9: -- bhavitavyaṃ tu tena, yasmin saty anantaraṃ
GSP28sabbha1u:11: tathā hi prasiddhapadārthakaḥ sa kalpito bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:15: anyasyāpi karmaṇo 'nantaraṃ dharmajijñāsā yuktā, prāg api ca
GSP28sabbha1u:17: ucyate: tādṛśīṃ tu dharmajijñāsām adhikṛtya athaśabdaṃ prayuktavān
GSP28sabbha1u:18: ācāryaḥ, yā vedādhyayanam antareṇa na saṃbhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:19: katham ? vedavākyānām anekavidho vicāra iha vartiṣyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:20: api ca naiva vayam iha vedādhyayanāt pūrvaṃ dharmajijñāsāyāḥ pratiṣedhaṃ śiṣmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:21: na hy etad ekaṃ vākyaṃ purastāc ca vedādhyayanād dharmajijñāsāṃ pratiṣedhiṣyati, parastāc ca ānantaryaṃ prakariṣyati /
GSP28sabbha1u:22: bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam anyā hi vacanavyaktir asya purastād vedādhyayanād dharmajijñāsāṃ pratiṣedhataḥ, anyā ca parastād
GSP28sabbha1u:27: kiṃ tv adhīte vede dvayam āpatati, gurukulāc ca samāvartitavyaṃ
GSP28sabbha1u:29: tatra “gurukulān mā samāvartiṣṭa ; kathaṃ nu vedavākyāni vicārayet ?” ity evamartho 'yam upadeśaḥ
GSP28sabbha1u:30: yady evaṃ, na tarhi vedādhyayanaṃ pūrvaṃ dharmajijñāsāyāḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:31: evaṃ hi samāmananti “vedam adhītya snāyāt” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:32: iha ca vedam adhītya snāsyan dharmaṃ jijñāsamāna imam āmnāyam atikrāmet /
GSP28sabbha1u:35: anatikrāmanto vedam arthavantaṃ santam anarthakaṃ kalpayema /
GSP28sabbha1u:37: na ca tasya adhyayanamātrāt tatrabhavanto yājñikāḥ phalaṃ samāmananti /
GSP28sabbha1u:38: yad api ca samāmananti iva, tatrāpi “dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syāt” ity arthavādatāṃ vakṣyati /
GSP28sabbha1u:39: na ca adhītavedasya snānānantaryam etad vidhīyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:40: na hy atra ānantaryasya vaktā kaścic chabdo 'sti /
GSP28sabbha1u:45: na ca idaṃ snānam adṛṣṭārthaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:46: kiṃ tu lakṣaṇayā asnānādiniyamasya paryavasānaṃ vedādhyayanasamakālam āhuḥ “vedam adhītya
GSP28sabbha1u:48: tasmād vedādhyayanam eva pūrvam abhinirvartya anantaraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavya ity athaśabdasya sāmarthyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:50: 'nantaraṃ dharmajijñāsā na kartavyā” iti, kiṃ tu “vedam adhītya tvaritena na snātavyam, anantaraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavyaḥ” ity athaśabdasya arthaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:51: ataḥśabdo vṛttasya apadeśako hetvarthena, yathā “kṣemasubhikṣo 'yaṃ deśaḥ,
GSP28sabbha1u:53: evam “adhīto vedo dharmajijñāsāyāṃ hetur jñātaḥ, anantaraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavyaḥ” ity ataḥśabdasya
GSP28sabbha1u:54: / dharmāya hi vedavākyāni vicārayitum anadhītavedo na śaknuyāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:56: etasmāt kāraṇāt, anantaraṃ dharmaṃ jijñāsitum icched ity ataḥśabdasya
GSP28sabbha1u:60: sa punaḥ kathaṃ jijñāsitavyaḥ ? ko dharmaḥ, kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ, kāny asya sādhanāni,
GSP28sabbha1u:62: tatra ko dharmaḥ, kathaṃlakṣaṇa ity ekenaiva sūtreṇa vyākhyātaṃ “codanalakṣaṇo 'rtho dharmaḥ” iti1 /
GSP28sabbha1u:63: kāny asya sādhanāni, kāni sādhanābhāsāni, kiṃparaś ca iti śeṣalakṣaṇena vyākhyātam 2
GSP28sabbha1u:64: / kva puruṣaparatvaṃ kva vā puruṣo guṇabhūta ity etāsāṃ pratijñānāṃ
GSP28sabbha1u:66: dharmaḥ prasiddho vā syād aprasiddho vā /
GSP28sabbha1u:73: kecid anyaṃ dharmam āhuḥ, kecid anyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:74: so 'yam avicārya pravartamānaḥ kaṃcid eva upādadāno vihanyeta anarthaṃ ca ṛcchet /
GSP28sabbha1u:76: sa hi niḥśreyasena puruṣaṃ saṃyunakti iti pratijānīmahe /
GSP28sabbha1u:79: codanā iti kriyāyāḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam āhuḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:82: dhūmo lakṣaṇam agner iti hi vadanti
GSP28sabbha1u:83: / tayā yo lakṣyate, so 'rthaḥ puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasena saṃyunakti iti pratijānīmahe /
GSP28sabbha1u:84: codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭam ity evaṃjātīyakam arthaṃ śaknoty avagamayitum, nānyat kiṃcanendriyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:85: nanv atathābhūtam apy arthaṃ brūyāc codanā, yathā yatkiṃcana laukikaṃ
GSP28sabbha1u:86: vacanaṃ ṅadyās tīre phalāni santi” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:87: tat tathyam api bhavati, vitatham api bhavatīti /
GSP28sabbha1u:88: ucyate: vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate “bravīti ca vitathaṃ ca” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:89: bravīti ity ucyate 'vabodhayati, budhyamānasya nimittaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:90: yasmiṃś ca nimittabhūte saty avabudhyate, so 'vabodhayati /
GSP28sabbha1u:91: yadi ca codanāyāṃ satyām “agnihotrāt svargo bhavati” ity avagamyate, katham ucyate ṅa tathā bhavati” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:92: atha na tathā bhavati, katham avabudhyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:94: na ca śvargakāmo yajeta” ity ato vacanāt saṃdigdham avagamyate “bhavati vā svargo na vā bhavati” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:95: na ca niścitam avagamyamānam idaṃ mithyā syāt
GSP28sabbha1u:96: / yo hi janitvā pradhvaṃsate ṅaitad evam” iti, sa mithyāpratyayaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:97: na caiṣa kālāntare puruṣāntare 'vasthāntare deśāntare vā viparyeti /
GSP28sabbha1u:99: yat tu laukikaṃ vacanaṃ, tac cet pratyayitāt puruṣād indriyaviṣayaṃ vā,
GSP28sabbha1u:101: athāpratyayitāt puruṣād anindriyaviṣayaṃ vā, tat puruṣabuddhiprabhavam apramāṇam /
GSP28sabbha1u:102: aśakyaṃ hi tat puruṣeṇa jñātum ṛte vacanāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:103: -- aparasmāt pauruṣeyād vacanād avagatam iti cet /
GSP28sabbha1u:111: yathā cakṣuṣā rūpam upalabhyata iti darśanād evāvagatam
GSP28sabbha1u:112: / -- ucyate: upadeśo hi vyāmohād api bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:114: api ca pauruṣeyād vacanād “evam ayaṃ puruṣo veda” iti bhavati pratyayo, na “evam ayam artha” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:115: viplavate khalv api kaścit puruṣakṛtād vacanāt pratyayaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:116: na tu vedavacanasya mithyātve kiṃcana pramāṇam asti /
GSP28sabbha1u:118: pauruṣeyaṃ vacanaṃ vitatham upalabhya vacanasāmānyād vedavacanaṃ mithyety anumīyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:120: na hy anyasya vitathabhāve 'nyasya vaitathyaṃ bhavitum arhati, anyatvād eva /
GSP28sabbha1u:121: na hi devadattasya śyāmatve yajñadattasyāpi śyāmatvaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP28sabbha1u:122: api ca puruṣavacanasādharmyād vedava canaṃ vitatham ity anumānam /
GSP28sabbha1u:128: kiṃ dharmajijñāsayā ? - ucyate: ya eva śreyaskaraḥ, sa eva dharmaśabdenocyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:129: - katham avagamyate ? - yo hi yāgam anutiṣṭhati, taṃ dhārmika iti samācakṣate /
GSP28sabbha1u:130: yaś ca yasya kartā, sa tena vyapadiśyate, yathā pācako lāvaka iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:131: tena yaḥ puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasena saṃyunakti, sa eva dharmaśabdenocyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:137: lakṣyate, artho 'narthaś ca - ko 'rthaḥ? - yo nihśreyasāya jyotiṣṭomādiḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:138: - ko 'narthaḥ? - yaḥ pratyavāyāya śyeno vajra inour ity evamādiḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:139: tatra anartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ity arthagrahaṇam /
GSP28sabbha1u:141: anarthaḥ ? - hiṃsā hi sā, sā ca pratiṣiddhā /
GSP28sabbha1u:143: kartavyatayā upadiśyate ? - ucyate: naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyatayā
GSP28sabbha1u:145: yo hi hiṃsitum icchet, tasya ayam abhyupāya iti hi teoām
GSP28sabbha1u:149: nanv aśaktam idaṃ sūtram imāv arthāv abhivaditum, codanālakṣaṇo dharmo nendriyādilakṣaṇaḥ, arthaś ca dharmo nānartha iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:155: anyato 'vatage 'rthe sūtram evamartham ity avagamyate, tena ca ekadeśaḥ sūtryata iti sūtram
GSP28sabbha1u:156: tatra bhinnayor eva vākyayor imāv ekadeśāv ity avagantavyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:157: athavā arthasya sataś codanālakṣaṇasya dharmatvam ucyata ity ekārtham eveti /
GSP28sabbha1u:161: idānīṃ tasya nimittaṃ parīkṣiṣyāmahe, kiṃ codanaiva uta anyad api iti /

GSP28sabbha1u:165: Jaim_1,1.4: satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam animittam, vidyamnānopalambhanatvāt
GSP28sabbha1u:168: evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ hi tat: satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam /
GSP28sabbha1u:169: sati indriyārthasaṃbandhe yā puruṣasya buddhir jāyate, tat pratyakṣam /

GSP28sabbha1u:178: Jaim_1,1.5: autpattikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandhas tasya jñānam upadeśo

GSP28sabbha1u:182: aviyuktaḥ śabdārthayor bhāvaḥ saṃbandhena, notpannayoḥ paścāt saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:183: autpattikaḥ śabdasyārthena saṃbandhas tasya agnihotrādilakṣaṇasya dharmasya nimittaṃ pratyakṣādibhir anavagatasya /

GSP28sabbha1u:193: na hy evaṃ sati pratyayāntaram apekṣitavyaṃ puruṣāntaraṃ vā /
GSP28sabbha1u:195: bādarāyaṇasyedaṃ mataṃ kīrtyate bādarāyaṇaṃ pūjayituṃ, nātmīyaṃ mataṃ paryudasitum /

GSP28sabbha1u:220: bhavati, indriyaṃ vā timirādibhiḥ, saukṣmyādibhir vā bāhyo viṣayas, tato

GSP28sabbha1u:231: pratyayasya hi nirālambanatā svabhāva upalakṣitaḥ svapne /
GSP28sabbha1u:232: jāgrato 'pi śtambha” iti vā “kuḍyam” iti vā pratyaya eva bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:234: ucyate: śtambha” iti jāgrato buddhiḥ supariniścitā kathaṃ viparyasiṣyati?
GSP28sabbha1u:235: - svapne 'py evam eva supariniścitā āsīt prāk prabodhanāt, na tatra kaścid
GSP28sabbha1u:236: viśeṣa iti cen, - na, svapne viparyayadarśanād aviparyayāc ca itarasmin /
GSP28sabbha1u:238: -- yadi pratyayatvāt svapnapratyayasya mithyābhāvaḥ, jāgratpratyayasyāpi bhavitum arhati
GSP28sabbha1u:239: atha pratītis tathābhāvasya hetuḥ, na śakyate “pratyayād ayam anya” iti vaditum /
GSP28sabbha1u:240: anyatas tu svapnapratyayasya mithyābhāvo viparyayād avagataḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:242: - sanidrasya manaso daurbalyān nidrā mithyābhāvasya hetuḥ
GSP28sabbha1u:248: - nanu jāgrato 'pi karaṇadoṣaḥ syāt ? - yadi syād, avagamyeta /
GSP28sabbha1u:251: prabuddho hy avagacchati ṅidrākrāntaṃ me mana āsīd” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:255: atas tadbhinnam artharūpaṃ nāma na kiṃcid asti iti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:256: syād etad evaṃ, yady arthākārā buddhiḥ syāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:261: kṣaṇikā hi sā na buddhyantarakālam avasthāsyata iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:262: utpadyamānaivāsau jñāyate jñāpayati cārthāntaraṃ pradīpavad iti yady ucyeta, tan na /
GSP28sabbha1u:264: kaścid buddhim upalabhate, jñāte tv anumānād avagacchati /
GSP28sabbha1u:266: - nanu utpannāyām eva buddhāv artho “jñāta” ity ucyate nānutpannāyām /
GSP28sabbha1u:267: ataḥ pūrvaṃ buddhir utpadyate, paścāj jñāto 'rthaḥ
GSP28sabbha1u:269: pūrvaṃ buddhir utpadyate, na tu pūrvaṃ jñāyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:270: bhavati hi kadācid etad, yaj jñāto 'rthaḥ san “ajñāta” ity ucyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:271: na ca arthavyapadeśam antareṇa buddhe rūpopalambhanam /
GSP28sabbha1u:272: tasmān nāvyapadeśyā buddhir, avyapadeśyaṃ ca naḥ pratyakṣam /
GSP28sabbha1u:274: api ca kāmam ekarūpatve buddher evābhāvo, na tv arthasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ /

GSP28sabbha1u:278: api ca niyatanimittas tantuṣv evopādīyamāneṣu paṭapratyayaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:279: itarathā tantūpādāne 'pi kadācid ghaṭabuddhir avikalendriyasya syāt /

GSP28sabbha1u:290: upamānam api sādṛśyam asaṃnikṛṣṭe 'rthe buddhim utpādayati, yathā gavayadarśanaṃ gosmaraṇasya
GSP28sabbha1u:291: arthāpattir api dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā 'rtho 'nyathā nopapadyata ity arthakalpanā, yathā jīvato devadattasya gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahirbhāvasya adṛṣṭasya kalpanā /
GSP28sabbha1u:294: nanu pratyakādīny anyāni bhavantu nāma pramāṇāni, śabdas tu na prāmāṇam /

GSP28sabbha1u:313: karaṇam” iti vākyād avagamyate, “karaṇaṃ ced utpannaṃ, kāryeṇa
GSP28sabbha1u:316: na ca dṛṣṭe kāraṇe saty adṛṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate, pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:317: evaṃ dṛṣṭāpacārasya vedasya svargādy api phalaṃ na bhavati iti manyāmahe /
GSP28sabbha1u:318: dṛṣṭaviruddham api bhavati kiṃcid vaidikaṃ vacanam /

GSP28sabbha1u:344: saṃbandhaḥ, kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām, yadi saṃśleṣalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbandham abhipretya ucyate /

GSP28sabbha1u:351: dṛṣṭvā avagacchāmaḥ, ṅa prathamaśruta” iti prathamaśravaṇe pratyayam
GSP28sabbha1u:353: yāvatkṛtvaḥ śrutena “iyaṃ saṃjñā, ayaṃ saṃjñī” ity avadhāritaṃ bhavati, tāvatkṛtvaḥ śrutād arthāvagamaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:354: yathā cakṣur draṣṭṛ na bāhyena prakāśena vinā prakāśayati ity adraṣṭṛ na bhavati /

GSP28sabbha1u:363: pṛthagbhūtayoś ca yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ, sa kṛtako dṛṣṭo, yathā rajjughaṭayor iti
GSP28sabbha1u:364: atha “gaur” ity atra kaḥ śabdaḥ ? - gakāraukāravisarjanīyā iti bhagavān
GSP28sabbha1u:366: śrotragrahaṇe hy arthe loke śabdaśabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ /

GSP28sabbha1u:383: laukikāni vacanāny upapannārthāny anupapannārthāni ca dṛśyante, yathā “devadatta, gām abhyāja” ity evamādīni “daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍ apūpā” ity evamādīni ca /

GSP28sabbha1u:385: “pūrvāparībhūtaṃ bhāvam ākhyātenācaṣṭe 'vrajati, pacati' ity upakramaprabhṛty apavargaparyantam” iti yathā /

GSP28sabbha1u:390: gauṇa eṣa śabda iti cet, - na gauṇo 'kṣareṣu nimittabhāvaḥ, tadbhāve bhāvāt tadabhāve cābhāvāt
GSP28sabbha1u:391: athāpi gauṇaḥ syāt, na “gauṇaḥ śabdo mā bhūd” ity etāvatā pratyakṣādibhir anavagamyamāno 'rthaḥ śakyaḥ parikalpayitum /

GSP28sabbha1u:397: tasmād “gaur” iti gakārādivisarjanīyāntaṃ padam akṣarāṇy eva /
GSP28sabbha1u:398: na tebhyo vyatiriktam anyat padaṃ nāma iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:400: - ucyate: śabdakalpanāyāṃ sā ca śabdakalpanā ca /
GSP28sabbha1u:402: atha “gaur” ity asya śabdasya ko 'rthaḥ? - sāsnādiviśiṣṭā ākṛtir iti
GSP28sabbha1u:404: - nanv ākṛtiḥ sādhyāsti vā na veti ? - na pratyakṣā satī sādhyā bhavitum arhati /

GSP28sabbha1u:413: “asati vane vanapratyayo bhavati” iti pratyakṣam eva ākṣipyate “vṛkṣā api na santi” iti ? yady evaṃ, pratyuktaḥ sa mahāyānikaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:414: atha kim ākṛtisadbhāvavādy upālabhyate śiddhāntāntaraṃ te duṣyati ; vane 'pi te

GSP28sabbha1u:417: / sa hi vakṣyati “duṣyatu, yadi duṣyati ; kiṃ tena duṣṭena aduṣṭena vā prakṛtaṃ tvayā sādhitaṃ bhavati madīyo vā pakṣo dūṣito bhavati ?” iti /

GSP28sabbha1u:420: mithyaiṣa vanapratyaya ity ato “vanaṃ nāsti” ity avagacchāmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:429: atha saṃbandhaḥ ka iti? - yat śabde vijñāte 'rtho vijñāyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:430: sa tu kṛtaka iti pūrvam upapāditam /
GSP28sabbha1u:431: tasmān manyāmahe kenāpi puruṣeṇa śabdānām arthaiḥ saha saṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā saṃvyavahartuṃ vedāḥ praṇītā iti /

GSP28sabbha1u:433: kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate “apauruṣeya eṣa saṃbandha” iti ?puruṣasya saṃbandhur abhāvāt
GSP28sabbha1u:434: - kathaṃ saṃbandhā nāsti ? - pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya abhāvāt
GSP28sabbha1u:436: nanu ciravṛttatvāt pratyakṣasya aviṣayo bhaved idānīntanānām /
GSP28sabbha1u:437: na hi ciravṛttaḥ san na smaryeta /
GSP28sabbha1u:438: na ca himavadādiṣu kūpārāmādivad asmaraṇaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP28sabbha1u:439: puruṣaviyogo hi teṣu bhavati deśotsādena kulotsādena vā /
GSP28sabbha1u:444: yadi hi puruṣaḥ kṛtvā saṃbandhaṃ vyavahārayet, vyavahārakāle 'vaśyaṃ smartavyo bhavet /
GSP28sabbha1u:445: saṃpratipattau hi kartṛvyavahartror arthaḥ sidhyati, na vipratipat tau /

GSP28sabbha1u:453: yady api ca vismaraṇam upapadyeta, tathāpi na pramāṇam antareṇa saṃbandhāraṃ pratipadyemahi, yathā “vidyamānasyāpy anupalambhanaṃ bhavati”

GSP28sabbha1u:465: vṛddhānāṃ svārthena vyavaharamānānām upaśṛṇvanto bālāḥ pratyakṣam arthaṃ pratipadyamānā dṛśyante
GSP28sabbha1u:466: te 'pi vṛddhā yadā bālā āsaṃs, tadā 'nyebhyo vṛddhebhyas, te
GSP28sabbha1u:467: 'py anyebhya iti nāsty ādir ity evaṃ vā bhavet /
GSP28sabbha1u:469: śabdo 'rthena saṃbaddha āsīt, atha kenacit saṃbandhāḥ pravartitā iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:470: atra vṛddhavyavahāre sati nārthād āpadyeta saṃbandhasya kartā /
GSP28sabbha1u:471: api ca vṛddhavyavahāravādinaḥ pratyakṣam upadiśanti, kalpayanti itare saṃbandhāram /
GSP28sabbha1u:472: na ca pratyakṣe pratyarthini kalpanā sādhvī /
GSP28sabbha1u:475: yathā asmin deśe sāsnādimati gośabdaḥ, evaṃ sarveṣu durgameṣv api /
GSP28sabbha1u:481: na hi saṃbandhavyatiriktaḥ kaścit kālo 'sti, yasmin na kaścid api śabdaḥ kenacid arthena saṃbaddha āsīt /

GSP28sabbha1u:484: / yena kriyeta, tasya kena kṛtaḥ? athānyena kenacit kṛtaḥ, tasya keneti,
GSP28sabbha1u:486: tasmād avaśyam anena saṃbandhaṃ kurvatā akṛtasaṃbandhāḥ kecana śabdā vṛddhavyavahārasiddhā abhyupagantavyāḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:487: asti ced vyavahārasiddhiḥ, na niyogataḥ saṃbandhā bhavitavyam ity arthāpattir
GSP28sabbha1u:489: - syād etat: aprasiddhasaṃbandhā bālāḥ kathaṃ vṛddhebhyaḥ pratipadyanta iti /

GSP28sabbha1u:496: tad viśeṣeṣv ajñāyamāneṣu ubhayam apy anavakḷptam /
GSP28sabbha1u:500: na hy evaṃ sati puruṣāntaraṃ pratyayāntaraṃ vā apekṣate /

GSP28sabbha1u:504: yena yena hi pramīyate, tat tat pramāṇam /

GSP28sabbha1u:591: tasmād vinaśvarād anyaḥ sa ity avagacchāmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:592: na ca śakyam evam avagantuṃ “yathopalabhyante 'rthā na tathā bhavanti, yathā tu khalu nopalabhyante tathā bhavanti” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:595: na ca ahampratyayo vyāmoha iti śakyate vaktum, bādhakapratyayābhāvāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:597: / evaṃ cet, sa eva yajñāyudhī iti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:598: āha : yadi vijñānād anyad asti vijñātṛ, vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām
GSP28sabbha1u:605: katham asau nidarśyeteti ? yathā ca kaścic cakṣuṣmān svayaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati na ca
GSP28sabbha1u:606_0: śaknoty anyasmai jātyandhāya tan nidarśayituṃ, na ca “tan na śakyate nidarśayitum”
GSP28sabbha1u:606_1: ity etāvatā ṅāsti” ity avagamyate, evam asau puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate na
GSP28sabbha1u:606_2: cānyasmai śaknoti darśayitum, anyasya draṣṭus taṃ
GSP28sabbha1u:610: tena sarve svena svenātmanā ātmānam upalabhamānāḥ santy eva, yady api parapuruṣair nopalabhyanta iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:611: athāsmin arthe brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati “śāntāyāṃ vāci kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ ?
GSP28sabbha1u:613: pareṇa nopalabhyata ity atrāpi brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati “agṛhyo na hi gṛhyata” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:614: pareṇa na gṛhyata ity etadabhiprāyam etat /
GSP28sabbha1u:616: atrāpi brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati “atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃjyotir bhavati” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:617: kena punar upāyena ayam anyasmai kathyata iti ? - atrāpy upāye brāhmaṇaṃ
GSP28sabbha1u:618: bhavati śa eṣa neti nety ātmneti hovāca” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:619: asāv “ayam evaṃrūpa” iti na śakyate nidarśayitum /
GSP28sabbha1u:620: yac ca paraḥ paśyati, tatpratiṣedhas tasyopadeśopāyaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:624: nātmā; asti śarīrād anyaḥ sa cātmā” iti śarīrapratiṣedhena ātmopadiśyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:625: tathā prāṇādayo nātmāna iti tatpratiṣedhena tebhyo 'nya upadiśyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:626: tathā parasthāḥ sukhādayaḥ pareṇa liṅgair upalabhyante /
GSP28sabbha1u:627: te 'pi nātmāna iti tatpratiledhena tebhyo 'nya upadiśyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:628: yaḥ svayaṃ paśyati, na tato 'nyaḥ puruṣa ity etad api puruṣapravṛttyā anumīyate, yadā ' sau puruṣaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāmikṛtānām arthānāṃ pratisamādhāne śeṣānuṣṭhāne ca yatate /
GSP28sabbha1u:629: ataḥ pravṛttyāvagamyate ṅūnam asāv anityān nityam avagacchati” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:630: upamānāc copadiśyate “yādṛśaṃ bhavān svayam ātmānaṃ paśyati, anenopamānenāvagaccha “aham api tādṛśam eva
GSP28sabbha1u:631: paśyāmi” iti, yathā kaścid ātmīyāṃ vedanāṃ parasmā ācakṣśīta
GSP28sabbha1u:632: “dahyamānasyeva me bhavati, yātyamānasyeva me bhavati, rudhyamānasyeva me bhavati” iti
GSP28sabbha1u:633: ataḥ svayam avagamyamānatvād asti tadvyatiriktaḥ puruṣa iti
GSP28sabbha1u:634: yad apy ucyate “vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām” iti, yady upāyam eva
GSP28sabbha1u:635: niṣedhasi, na śakyam upāyam antareṇa upeyam upetum /
GSP28sabbha1u:636: ayam evābhyupāyo jñatavyānām arthānāṃ “yo yathā jñāyate, sa tathā” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:642: “ tasmān na vijñānaṃ pratyākhyāya kasyacid rūpaṃ nidarśayituṃ śakyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:643: na ca niyogataḥ pratyaye pratīte pratyayārthaḥ pratīto bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:645: 'pi hi pratyaye saty arthaḥ pratīyata eva /
GSP28sabbha1u:647: vijñeyo 'rthaḥ pratyaka ity etat pūrvam evoktam /
GSP28sabbha1u:648: tad avaśyakartavye 'pahnave kāmaṃ vijñānam apahnūyeta nārtha ity etad apy uktam eva /
GSP28sabbha1u:649: tasmād asti sukhādibhyo 'nyo nityaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:650: atha yad uktaṃ “vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny
GSP28sabbha1u:651_0: evānuvinaśyati, na pretya saṃjñāsti” iti, atrocyate: “atraiva mā bhagavān mohāntam
GSP28sabbha1u:651_1: āpīpadad” iti 1 paricodanottarakāle 'pahnutya mohāntābhiprāyam asya vacanasya varṇitavān
GSP28sabbha1u:651_2: ṅa vāre 'haṃ mohaṃ bravīmi, avināśī vāre 'yam
GSP28sabbha1u:652: ātmā anucchittidharmā, mātrāsaṃsargas tv asya bhavati” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:657: śvargakāmo yajeta” iti vacanāntareṇa avagatam anuvadiṣyate /
